[[File:Neil Finn.jpg|thumb|250px]]
'''Neil Finn''' is a New Zealand singer and musician, both as a solo artist and as a member of the bands Split Enz and [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crowded_House Crowded House]. He performed "[[Song of the Lonely Mountain]]", the credit song of ''[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey]]''.
